Sentencas: Fuel flexibility of solid oxide fuel cells enables the use of low cost and practical fuels like syngas.
Titulo: Electrochemical Oxidation of Syngas on Nickel and Ceria Anodes

Sentencas: Understanding of the oxidation kinetics with syngas is essential for proper selection of anode material and its design optimization.
Titulo: Electrochemical Oxidation of Syngas on Nickel and Ceria Anodes

Sentencas: Using nickel and ceria pattern anodes, we study the electrochemical oxidation of syngas in both dry and wet environments.
Titulo: Electrochemical Oxidation of Syngas on Nickel and Ceria Anodes

Sentencas: In dry environment, the polarization resistance of CO oxidation drops drastically with the addition of small amounts of hydrogen to CO gas stream.
Titulo: Electrochemical Oxidation of Syngas on Nickel and Ceria Anodes

Sentencas: In wet environment (4% moisture), the polarization resistance of CO is only slightly higher than syngas and hydrogen.
Titulo: Electrochemical Oxidation of Syngas on Nickel and Ceria Anodes

Sentencas: Observation in the first case is related to the hydrogen preferential oxidation whereas latter is a combined effect of water gas shift reaction and preferential oxidation of hydrogen.
Titulo: Electrochemical Oxidation of Syngas on Nickel and Ceria Anodes

Sentencas: Kinetic modeling is also carried out to understand hydrogen and CO co-oxidation.
Titulo: Electrochemical Oxidation of Syngas on Nickel and Ceria Anodes

Sentencas: Simulation suggests that CO, besides hydrogen, may also electrochemically oxidize depending upon its concentration in the syngas.
Titulo: Electrochemical Oxidation of Syngas on Nickel and Ceria Anodes

Sentencas: At higher concentration, CO electrochemical oxidation may be non-negligible especially in case of ceria anodes.
Titulo: Electrochemical Oxidation of Syngas on Nickel and Ceria Anodes
